dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
ExtUtils::MakeMaker - Create a module Makefile. This utility is designed
to write a Makefile for an extension module from a Makefile.PL. It is
based on the Makefile.SH model provided by Andy Dougherty and the
perl5-porters.
dependencies.name: perl-extutils-makemaker

dependencies.description:
Text::Glob implements glob(3) style matching that can be used to match
against text rather than fetching names from a filesystem.
dependencies.name: perl-text-glob

dependent_to.description: Rapid large-scale prokaryote pan genome analysis
dependent_to.name: roary

description:
File::Find::Rule is a friendlier interface to File::Find. It allows you
to build rules which specify the desired files and directories.
name: perl-file-find-rule

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
